name: NEW LIFE PENTICOSTLE CHURCH

address: Door No.38/3716-8, Y S Jayamma Colony

briefDescription: We are glad to introduce "New Life Penticostle Church" is a Non-Governmental, Non-commercial and Non-profit making voluntary organization working for the welfare of the target poor and needy women from humanitarian grounds. Our society is specifically working for the welfare of the needy women and Children, Disabilities children, Men and Women, Young People.We have good deal of experience  promoting environmental sustainable development, Promoting democracy and human rights through developing effective and implementation of the various kinds of women welfare schemes as Vocational Trainings (or) Skill upgradation Training, Income Generation, women and child Health, Education and awareness for the women etc.,
